response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $8,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its creation. I am confident it will provide you with unparalleled benefits. Considering its worth and the value it brings, I would like to extend an offer to sell it to you for $7,500. I believe this price reflects the quality and the value you're getting while still allowing me to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 7500}
